dict.acceptation: 简单的；单纯的；易受骗的；天真的；
笨蛋；愚蠢的行为；出身低微者；

sent.orig: Keywords: turbulence model. SIMPLE method. wall function. Air distribution and numerical simulation.
sent.trans: 关键词湍流模型。SIMPLE方法。壁面函数。气流组织。数值模拟。

sent.orig: On the non-staggered grid system, the discretization equations are solved with SIMPLE algorithm and PSIC method.
sent.trans: 在非交错网格体系下，气相用SIMPLE法求解，液相采用颗粒群轨道模型，并用PSIC算法对其进行数值求解。

sent.orig: Making the simple complicated is commonplace; making the complicated simple, awesomely simple, that's creativity.
sent.trans: 让简单事情变复杂是平庸；让复杂事情变简单，惊人地简单，是创造力。

sent.orig: Simple, more simple, extreme simple state manager.
sent.trans: 简单，更简单，极端简单的国家经理。

sent.orig: White simple as simple as thorough glass, simple and pure as the snow.
sent.trans: 简单的如同白纸，简单的如同透彻的玻璃，简单的如同纯洁的雪花。
